lines.text: let a , b , c , max be integers
the value of max is equal to ( a * b * c )
if ( a + b + c is greater than max ) , max is equal to ( a + b + c )
lines.code: if ( a + b + c > max ) max = a + b + c ;

lines.text: if ( a + ( b * c ) is greater than max ) , max is equal to a + ( b * c )
lines.code: if ( a + ( b * c ) > max ) max = a + ( b * c ) ;

lines.text: if ( ( a * b ) + c is greater than max ) , max is equal to ( a * b ) + c
lines.code: if ( ( a * b ) + c > max ) max = ( a * b ) + c ;

lines.text: if ( ( a + b ) * c is greater than max ) , max is equal to ( a + b ) * c
lines.code: if ( ( a + b ) * c > max ) max = ( a + b ) * c ;

lines.text: if ( a * ( b + c ) is greater than max ) , max is equal to a * ( b + c )
lines.code: if ( a * ( b + c ) > max ) max = a * ( b + c ) ;
